CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Gauzy is a global leader in vision and light control solutions for the automotive, aeronautics, architecture, and safety technology industries. Its core capabilities start with world-class research and development which leads to the manufacturing and marketing of surfaces, systems and solutions that are smart and multifunctional for the spaces we spend our time in most. From glass that switches between transparent and opaque on an aircraft, automobile or building to transparent displays for digital signage and communications, to ADAS technologies for safer roads, Gauzy is there, changing the world through the control and manipulation of light.
